typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CityID as integer '000',
		CityName as string,
		StateProvinceID as integer '000',
		LatestRecordedPopulation as integer '000',
		LastEditedBy as string,
		ValidFrom as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		ValidTo as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
